content:
ValidationErrorEventAction Enum

Definition

Describes whether a ValidationError object has been added or cleared.

In this Article

public enum ValidationErrorEventAction
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ValidationErrorEventAction

Fields

Added

A new ValidationError object has been detected.
Removed

An existing ValidationError object has been cleared.
